name: Association Justice & Environment, z.s.
goal:
J&E aims for better legislation and implementation of environmental law on the national and European Union (EU) stage to protect the environment, people and nature. J&E does this by enhancing the enforcement of EU legislation through the use of European law and exchange of information on the national, cross-border and wider European level.
All J&E activities are based on the expertise, knowledge and experience of its member organisations. The members contribute their legal know-how and are instrumental in the initiation, design and implementation of the J&E work programme.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
J&E is currently working on:
Public participation (the Aarhus Convention) :
Transparency of PILOT and infringement proceedings of the EU
Access to environmental justice
Climate & Energy: Projects of Common Interest (PCIs)
Nature conservation: Environmental Liability Directive (ELD)
In the past, J&E also worked on NATURA 2000, Waste, Transport, Health and Environmental Impact Assessment / Strategic Environmental Assessment.
